attributes.action: discontinue plans to forcably move all UK radio stations to a Digital platform
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, believe that this is an ill-thought-out initiative.  By removing analogue radio entirely the Gov't will render many devices useless (there is no sign of "converter boxes" on the horizon that will allow people to continue using "classic" valve radios, for example) and devices such as "Crystal sets", the cornerstone of teaching electronics for over a century, will no longer function.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
